episode.title: 高木刑事, 手錠で逃走
Detective Takagi on the Run in Handcuffs
L`Inspecteur Takagi menotté et en cavale
Takagi-keiji, Tejou de Tousou
episode.summary: Conan and friends witness waiter Someya punching his coworker Nashimoto at a family restaurant. Nearby, Chie trembles in fear for some reason. Three days later, Detective Takagi is escorting Someya to the Metropolitan Police Department in a patrol car, and Someya bungles his escape attempt. Takagi and Someya find themselves alone and handcuffed together. Takagi tries to determine why Someya attempted to flee, but... Conan learns about their situation while watching the news and goes to question Nashimoto. Nashimoto confesses Chie was being talked by Someya. While it`s likelly Someya will go to see Chie, Conan thinks something seems not quite right... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 米花ポン出血大サービス
Bekapon`s Bleeding Service
Bekapon et la promo qui tue
Beikapon Shukketsu Dai Service
episode.summary: Supermarket Beikado employee Kanzaki receives death threats over the phone. He hires Kogoro to investigate the threats, but Kogoro believes it to be a prank played by a friend. However, an incident occurs the following day on Sunday. A man wearing a ski mask appears at Beikado. While shouting, "Die, Kanzaki," he stabs the man dressed in Beikado`s mascot Bekapon costume and runs away. The victim is employee Shimomura. Every Sunday, Kanzaki interacts with customers dressed as Bekapon, but due to a stomach ache, Shimomura wore the costume in his place. Megure believes the culprit accidentally stabbed Shimomura, but Conan notices something puzzling about the case... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女王様の天気予報
The Queen`s Weather Forecast
La reine de la météo
Joou-sama no Tenkiyohou
episode.summary: A weather forecaster falls to her death after leaning on a second-floor railing, but Conan notices several suspicious things about the body. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: ボディーガード毛利小五郎
Bodyguard Mori Kogoro
Kogorô Môri garde du corps
Bodyguard Mouri Kogorou
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran accompany actresses Haneki Ryo and Sawazaki Reina to the on-location shoot of their gourmet travels TV show. After several attempts on her life, Ryo feels she is in danger. Kogoro is hired to protect Ryo as her bodyguard and determine who is trying to kill her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三人の第一発見者 (後編)
Three First Discoverers (Part 2)
Les trois premiers sur les lieux (2de partie)
Sannin no Daiichi Hakkensha (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Scriptwriter Yasue is found dead in her apartment hanging from a noose. Shibakaru, Sakaba, and Hamanaka all testify she was already dead when they visited her apartment during the presumed time of her death, and Megure believes she may have killed herself. Near the body are scattered 500 thousand yen and roughly a hundred pages of manuscript paper, but Megure determines they would not have been enough to stand on. After questioning, Conan uses his smart phone to investigate the three year old case of a group of thieves who murdered a couple and stole two million yen and learns the name of Yasue`s young friend is Ganno Mamoru. Conan has already arrived at the truth of the situation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動く標的
The Moving Target
Cible mouvante
Ugoku Hyouteki
episode.summary: Conan witnesses office worker Fukurokoji Sadao fall off the roof of a ten story building. Fukurokoji seems to be falling directly towards office worker Komatsu Hitoshi, who is standing in the alleyway, but Conan kicks a ball into him, and he falls into a nearby heap of garbage and survives. At first it was thought to be an attempted suicide by Fukurokoji, but Inspector Megure determines someone carried the plastered drunk Fukurokoji to the roof and pushed him off, making it an attempted murder. After investigating the rooftop, Conan questions Komatsu, and he deduces that the murderer was attempting to kill not only Fukurokoji, but Komatsu as well. He tries to find someone bearing a grudge against them both, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢みる乙女の迷推理
The Dreaming Girl`s Confused Deduction
L`enquête embrouillée d`une jeune rêveuse
Yume Miru Otome Meisuiri
episode.summary: Conan unexpectedly finds himself helping college student Funako find Hikone, a job-hopper who has been missing for two days. They visit Hikone`s apartment and meet college stduent Kiyose who lives on his right and former office worker Nashida who lives on his left, but gain no useful information from either of them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おしどり夫婦の策略
The Lovebirds` Ruse
Les stratagèmes d`un couple parfait
Oshidori Fuufu no Sakuryaku
episode.summary: Mystery writer Kanbayashi falls to his death in the alley between apartment buildings A and B. He fell from the hallway of the fifth floor of building A where his office is located. When he fell, for some reason Kanbayashi changed from his socks into sneakers and was wearing gloves. Megure questions the victim`s wife Seiko and first one to discover the body as well as Sugiyama, building A`s security guard. It seems Kanbayashi and Seiko were a couple of lovebirds. As the police proceed with the investigation, an accident, murder, and suicide all seem like possibilities. Countless mysteries surround the death, and Kanbashi`s actions were mysterious as well. Conan narrows his focus and quickly draws closer to the truth of the fall, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 若奥様が消えた秘密
The Secret of the Missing Young Lady
Le secret de la jeune épouse disparue
Wakaoku-sama ga Kieta Himitsu
episode.summary: On her way home from school, Ayumi sees Makabe carrying the unconscious body of his wife Yuri to his car. Believing the young married woman she sometimes visited was murdered by her husband, Ayumi and the Detective Boys return to the house to investigate. They are confronted by Makabe while they are looking around the yard. When they ask him where his wife is, he answers that she is in the mountains. Conan and his friends also question a deliveryman who says he heard someone scream in the house the day before. Convinced that murder is a real possibility, they enter the house using a spare key and find a mysterious doll that was not there before as well as dried blood on the floor... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 1億円を追いかけろ
After That Hundred Million Yen
Cent millions de yens à rattraper
1 Oku En o Oikakeru
episode.summary: The soon to be five year old daughter Reina of black marketing lending company president Saeki and his wife Hiroko is kidnapped. The kidnapper demands they bring a 100 million yen ransom to Beika Central Park. He choosestheir housekeeper Suzuko to transport the money, and Conan finds it odd he didn`t choose a family member. Following Kogoro`s advice, Megure has GPS transmitters attached to the bag containing the ransom money, under the car, and in the brooch on Suzuko`s breast. After arriving at the park, wary of transmitters, the kidnapper instructs Suzuko to change cars and bags over the phone. Furthermore, the kidnapper issues instructions to Suzuko to outwit the police and foil their plans... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 探偵団の密室推理合戦
The Detective Boys` Locked Room Mystery Battle
Mystère en chambre close pour les Detective Boys
Tanteidan no Misshitsu Suiri Kassen
episode.summary: Conan, Genta, Mitsuhiko, Ayumi, and Ai go to the site of a demolished mansion owned by Professor Agasa`s acquaintance to practice soccer, but when they get there they find the police conducting an investigation. The body of a man was found floating in the pool inside the lot. He died to a blow to the back of the head by a blunt object, and the gate to the lot was unlocked by Agasa, who arrived earlier. The lot is surrounded by a brick wall, and on top of the wall are glass shards and barbed wire. The gate was last opened three days prior, but the victim is presumed to have died before midnight last night. The incident occurred in a roofless locked lot. The Detective Boys try to tackle the locked room mystery, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コナンと海老蔵 歌舞伎十八番ミステリー (前編)
Conan and Ebizo`s Kabuki Juhachiban Mystery (Part 1)
Conan, Ebizô et le mystère d`un classique du kabuki (1re partie)
Conan to Ebizou: Kabuki Juuhachiban Mystery (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan prevents an accident involving a out-of-control car with no working breaks. Someone poked holes in the brake hose, and the police investigate the incident as an attempted murder. The driver Hosoo was on his way to deliver a valuable double-sided mask to Ichikawa Ebizo, who is rehearsing at the kabuki theater. Ebizo plans to use the mask at next month`s performance of "Nanatsu Men." The chairman Matsubara takes the mask from Hosoo and keeps it in a locker during rehearsal, but the next morning, they discover the mask has been stolen. Hosoo`s secretary Takahashi is also found dead inside a car. In the passenger seat is an empty duralumin case that contained the mask. Conan investigates the rehearsal space and determines it is very likely the thief is involved in the play, and Ebizo is moved by Conan`s sharp detective skills. Later, Conan and Ebizo look for the thief together... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 火の用心の落とし穴
The Pitfall of Fire Precautions
Une prévention du feu semée d`embûches
Hi no Youjin no Otoshiana
episode.summary: Three arson cases occur at children`s playgrounds. Conan and his friends conduct a stake out at the lunch vendor used by the man they saw running from the crime scene. Last year, four fires were started at children`s playgrounds, but the suspect was never arrested. Kamaishi, the man they saw the previous night, appears at the lunch vendor, and Conan and his friends follow him. Later, a fire is started at the same playground where the previous year`s fourth fire occurred. Apparently Kamaishi was also watching the area to catch the arsonist. The next morning, the Detective Boys and Kamaishi go to investigate the fires together. Conan visits the various crime scenes and notices a certain rule... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鳥取砂丘ミステリーツアー (鳥取編)
The Tottori Sand Dunes Mystery Tour (Tottori Arc)
Jeu de piste à Tottori (2e partie : Tottori)
Tottori Sakyuu Mystery Tour (Tottori Hen)
episode.summary: The heirloom incense burner of the Kumado family, a prominent local family, is stolen. The thief returns the incense burner, but Detective Yamane follows Kogoro`s theory that a member of the family is the thief and thoroughly investigates the alibis of Iwao, Makie, Soichi, and Junji. Conan finds Naomi`s alibi odd and questions her uncle Adachi. According to him, two years ago Naomi witnessed Shuko meeting with a man on the Tottori sand dunes and had been using the information to blackmail her. Hearing Adachi`s story, Conan realizes why Shuko had been tied up and draws closer to the truth behind the case... However, the real crime is about to occur... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鳥取砂丘ミステリーツアー (倉吉編)
The Tottori Sand Dunes Mystery Tour (Kurayoshi Arc)
Jeu de piste à Tottori (1re partie : Kurayoshi)
Tottori Sakyuu Mystery Tour (Kurayoshi Hen)
episode.summary: During a visit to Tottori, Kogoro, Conan, and Ran come across a case. Shuko, wife of the Kumado family`s eldest son, had her hands and feet bound by a robber, and the family`s heirloom incense burner was stolen. A pedant found at the crime scene casts suspicion on the family`s former housekeeper Naomi, but Kogoro and his family saw her at the sand museum at the time of the crime. Later, head of the household Kumado Isao receives an e-mail on his phone demanding 10 million yen in exchange for the incense burner. Kogoro suspects the crime was committed by a family member who was trying to frame Naomi, and investigates the alibis of Isao, eldest daughter Makie, eldest son Soichi, and second son Junji, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 腹話術師の錯覚 (前編)
The Ventriloquist`s Illusion (Part 1)
Les délires du ventriloque (1re partie)
Fukuwajutsishi no Sakaku (Zenpen)
episode.summary: The ventriloquist Tengan puts on a show about a ventriloquist who becomes possessed by hiis doll and murders his wife. Tengan falls victim to a genuine split personality disorder, and the personality of his doll appears and orders him to kill his wife Kazuko. Tengan asks Kogoro to watch him so he doesn`t kill his wife Kazuko, who had an affair with his apprentice Togawa, but Kogoro turns him down, saying it`s not his field of expertise. The next morning, Kazuko is found murdered. Tengan confesses that he may have killed his wife while he was unaware, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コナンと海老蔵 歌舞伎十八番ミステリー (後編)
Conan and Ebizo`s Kabuki Juhachiban Mystery (Part 2)
Conan, Ebizô et le mystère d`un classique du kabuki (2e partie)
Conan to Ebizou: Kabuki Juuhachiban Mystery (Kouhen)
episode.summary: While on his way to meet Kaneko, Conan is kidnapped. After losing consciousness, Conan awakens in the dark basement of a building being demolished. From overhead he hears the defeaning roar of heavy machinery drilling through concrete. Realizing he doesn`t have his phone, he attempts to use his Detective Boys badge to call for help, but there is no answer. Meanwhile, Ran and the Detective Boys become concerned that Conan still hasn`t come home. When Ai learns they can`t get in touch with him, she uses a GPS to locate Conan`s phone. They find it in a narrow alleyway in Ginza. Believing he may be the victim of a kidnapping related to the case, they turn on their badges and wait for him to respond... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かまいたちの宿 (前編)
The Kamaitachi Inn (Part 1)
L`hôtel du kamaitachi (1re partie)
Kamaitachi no Yado (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ran, Kogoro, Heiji, and Kazuka visit an inn deep in the mountains of Nagano. Heiji acquires a photo of a figure carrying a scythe running across the surface of the outdoor bath. Conan and his friends have come to investigate the tru identity of this figure who resembles a kamaitachi. At the inn they encouter writers Nakama and Koyanagi who have come to gather information on the incident as well. While searching inside a dark storehouse, Heiji suffers a cut on his right arm, Kogoro suffers one on the back of his hand, and Koyanagi suffers one on her cheek. The kamaitachi crosses everyone`s mind. Additional incidents thought to be the work of the kamaitachi keep occuring... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 腹話術師の錯覚 (後編)
The Ventriloquist`s Illusion (Part 2)
Les délires du ventriloque (2e partie)
Fukuwajutsishi no Sakaku (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Ventriloquist Tengan`s wife Kazuko is bludgeoned to death with a trophy. Afflicted by multiple personality disorder, Tengan confesses that he may have killed her while he was unaware, but based on the circumstances, Tengan`s apprentice Togawa, who was having an affair with Kazuko, rises as a suspect. Conan feels as though something is wrong with the case and investigates Tengan`s home with Detective Takagi. He examines the sideboard where the trophies are displayed and realizes what has been bothering him. Later, Conan asks Takagi some questions and closes in on the truth behind the case... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 県警の黒い闇 (後編)
The Darkness of the Prefectural Police (Part 3)
Les ténèbres de la police départementale (3e partie)
Kenkei no Kuroi Yami (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Inspector Takeda, Lieutenant Kano, and Sergeant Akiyama of the Nagano Prefectural Police are killed one after another. After observing the crime scenes, Section One Chief Kuroda puts out a BOLO for Inspector Yamato as the murderer of the three men. Conan learns about the man who holed up inside a bank six months prior and Kano`s maiden name from Inspector Morofushi and Detective Yui and closes in on the truth. He has realized who the Woodpocker Society is and the identity of the murderer. Meanwhile, Inspector Saegusa is called by Inspector Yamato to a shack on Mt. Saijo. Approaching from behind him in the culprit holding a stun gun. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 県警の黒い闇 (中編)
The Darkness of the Prefectural Police (Part 2)
Les ténèbres de la police départementale (2e partie)
Kenkei no Kuroi Yami (Chuuhen)
episode.summary: After Nagano Prefectural Police Inspector Takeda is murdered, Lieutenant Kano is found dead from hanging in his home. From the body`s condition, Inspector Morofushi reasons that after being strangled, the body was hanged from the ceiling by someone. Later, the culprit sends an e-mail declaring that he will kill three additional people. Segreant Akiyama is called to Mt. Saijozan by the culprit and is dragged off a cliff by a car. Inspector Yamato`s fingerprints are found on the rope that was wrapped around Kano`s neck, and Section One Chief Kuroda puts out a BOlO for Yamato as the suspect who murdered three men... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 県警の黒い闇 (前編)
The Darkness of the Prefectural Police (Part 1)
Les ténèbres de la police départementale (1re partie)
Kenkei no Kuroi Yami (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran visit the Kawanakajima battlefield while visiting Nagano where they run into Inspector Yamato and his associates of the Nagano Prefectural Police. Conan and his friends visit the Kansuke Shrine ruins and Yamamoto Kansuke`s grave, and while visiting the Chikumagawa River, their final destination, they come across a case: Inspector Takeda`s severed head came floating down the river. On the body`s forehead is a mark resembling a woodpecker`s footprint. Allegedly a mysterious group known as the Woodpecker Society exists in the Nagano Prefectural Police. Yamato and his associates search for someone who may have borne a grudge against Takeda and two cases in which Takeda shot and killed the suspects surface... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かまいたちの宿 (後編)
The Kamaitachi Inn (Part 2)
L`hôtel du kamaitachi (2e partie)
Kamaitachi no Yado (Kouhen)
episode.summary: As incidents thought to be the work of a demon known as the kamaitachi occur one after nother, Bonzo is murdered in the annex of the inn. Conan notices something odd about the crime scene, and based on the crime scene Heiiji believes the culprit came to the annex through the outdoor bath. However, the snow around the bath is undisturbed, meaning the culprit must have run across the surface of the outdoor bath. Nakama believes the kamaitachi must have done it after all. After hearing everyone`s testimony, Conan and Heiji close in on the truth behind the case and realize who the culprit is from a casual remark... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブログ女優の密室事件 (前編)
The Actress Blogger`s Locked Room Case (Part 1)
Meurtre à huis clos de l’actrice blogueuse (1re partie)
Blog Joyuu no Misshitsu Jiken (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan goes to a cake buffet with Genta, Mitsuhiko, Ayumi, Haibara, and Professor Agasa, where they meet Kitami Saya and Shono Kyona, two actresses competing for popularity on their blogs. Saya and Kyona have come to the hotel to film a drama set there. Kyona asks Saya if she`s seen her blogs and warns her that she should surrender if she doesn`t have to have her secret exposed. Conan checks Kyona`s blog but is unable to determine what the secret is. Later, Kyona is found murdered in her locked hotel room... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 安室に忍びよる影
The Shadow Approaching Amuro
L`ombre aux trousses d`Amuro
Amuro ni Shinobiyoru Kage
episode.summary: In the morning, Conan notices a supicious man watching Amuro at the Poirot Cafe. On his way home from school, he spots the same man. Believing something must be up if Conan is interested in him, Mitsuhiko, Genta, and Ayumi follow the man. However, the man suddenly disappears when he enters a shopping area. Conan asks Amuro about the man, and Amuro confesses that he was followed three days ago when he went shopping. Conan warns Amuro that the man may be a member of the Black Organization... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 残念でやさしい宇宙人
The Disappointing and Kind Alien
Un extraterrestre gentil mais malchanceux
Zannen de Yasashii Uchuujin
episode.summary: Unemployed man Hanzaki Yasuo is frightened when he sees office worker Takedera Hitoshi wearing a costume and slips and falls to his death at Beimyoji. Takedera has no malicious intentions, but because he caused an accidental death, it`s unlikely he`ll be cleared of charges. After questioning Takedera`s acquaintance first year student Kota and office workers Arisa and Susan who witnessed the incident, Conan and his friends suspect there may be more to the case. The Detective Boys investigate the case and close in on the truth, but later, a new incident occurs... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブログ女優の密室事件 (後編)
The Actress Blogger`s Locked Room Case (Part 2)
Meurtre à huis clos de l’actrice blogueuse (2e partie)
Blog Joyuu no Misshitsu Jiken (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Conan and his friends meet Kitami Saya and Shono Kyona, two actresses competing for popularity on their blogs, at a hotel. Kyona, whose blog features Saya`s secret, is found murdered in her locked hotel room. Based on the conditions at the crime scene and Saya`s actions, Conan believes she is the murderer. Conan gets Saya`s story in room 504 and determines how she entered Kyona`s room and the murder weapon. Later, Conan checks Kyona`s blog again and discovers Saya`s secret. A conversation between his friends helps him realize the secret behind the locked room... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 待合室の7人
The Seven People in the Waiting Room
Les 7 Suspects du hall d`attente
Machiaishitsu no 7 Nin
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran run into a typhoon on their way home from the hot springs and are forced to spend the night at the train station with salesman Hokari, factory manager Takegami, backpacker Carl, assemblyman`s secretary Norikoo, local old woman Fune, stationmaster Inagaki, and station employee Masako. When Kogoro exits the station`s hot spring, he discovers a scrap of paper in his coat pocket. On it is written the message “Mori-sensei, someone will be killed here tonight. Please catch the culprit. The culprit is--". Later, a murder actually does occur... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小五郎, 怒りの大追跡 (後編)
Kogoro`s Pursuit of Rage (Part 2)
La poursuite enragée de Kogorô (2e partie)
Kogorou, Ikari no Daitsuiseki (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Ran is mistaken for the popular idol Lisa and kidnapped. SNS messages between the kidnappers Takeyama and Ihara and Risa planning the kidnapping are found at their hideout. However, Conan believes the kidnapping to be the work of another kidnapper pretending to be Risa. Takeyama abandons the refrigerator Ran is trapped inside in the mountains. With the refrigerator sealed, the oxygen will eventually run out, and Ran won`t live to see the morning. Kogoro apppears on a local station and begs the kidnappers to at least spare his daughter`s life... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小五郎, 怒りの大追跡 (前編)
Kogoro`s Pursuit of Rage (Part 1)
La poursuite enragée de Kogorô (1re partie)
Kogorou, Ikari no Daitsuiseki (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Kogoro is hired to be the bodyguard of popular idol Risa Purple, and Conan and Ran get to enjoy her concert. Just as the concert is about to begin, two masked men attempt to kidnap Risa. During the confusion, they mistake Ran, who is cosplaying as Risa, for the idol, and mistakenly kidnap her instead. Kogoro and Conan go after the kidnappers, but lose track of them during their pursuit. Kogoro borrows the truck of a recycling shop worker who saw the kindappers and Ran and continues his pursuit. Conan discovers the identities of the kidnappers from an objected dropped near the boat the kidnappers abandoned, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 消えたフィアンセ
The Missing Fiancee
La fiancée disparue
Kieta Fiancee
episode.summary: Kogoro is hired by Chokai, the son of the distinguished Chokai Conglomerate family, to find his missing fiance. Kogoro and Conan discover that she called her landlady to tell her she was moving and her boss to say she was quitting her job. As their investigation progresses, they decide to meet with an old woman named Shigemi, the last person to see Motoko. Kogoro determines that Shigemi killed Motoko to get her out of the way, but Conan feels as though the investigation is going a little too smoothly... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 容疑者は熱愛カップル (後編)
The Suspects Are a Passionate Couple (Part 2)
Suspicion d`un couple enflammé (2e partie)
Yougisha wa Netsuai Couple (Kouhen)
episode.summary: When the body of Asuka, the restaurant`s owner, is found in the storeroom, Conan suspects the sommelier Yamada, the waiter Konoe, and the waitress Reiko. Inspector Megure`s suspicion towards Higo and Yoko, the first ones to discover the body, deepens. Conan notices something strange about the blanket Asuka was wearing while he slept. Recalling the restaurant staff`s testimony, Conan closes in on the truth and checks the lockers in the break room. Upon seeing Asuka`s clothes in the locker, he sees through the trick the culprit used to fabricate his alibi... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 容疑者は熱愛カップル (前編)
The Suspects Are a Passionate Couple (Part 1)
Suspicion d`un couple enflammé (1re partie)
Yougisha wa Netsuai Couple (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Big Osaka`s Higo Ryusuke and Okino Yoko`s passionate romance makes the news. Yoko fan Kogoro, Conan, and Higo fan Haibara decide to investigate if the news is true. Higo and Yoko were meeting at a restaurant run by Higo`s senior Asuka. The sommelier Yamada, waiter Konoe, and waitress Reiko search for Asuka who hasn`t yet returned but are unable to find him. Meanwhile, Hgio and Yoko discover Asuka`s body in the storeroom. Inspector Megure suspects Higo and Yoko who discovered the body, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 曇柄寺が隠す秘密
The Hidden Secret of Dongaraji Temple
Le secret du temple Dongara
Dongaraji ga Kakusu Himitsu
episode.summary: Shishito dies in an accident two hours after stealing 30 million yen from Beika Finance. Before his accident, he hid the money somewhere. Kogoro is hired by Ryozen, head priest of Dongaraji Temple, to find the culprit who made the phone threat demanding that construction on the temple be halted. It becomes clear that brothers Toraya Kinta and Ginsuke became flustered when they saw construction had begun on the temple. Conan hears a strange story about Eisaku, the father of the brothers. Kogoro believes the Toraya family and the missing 30 million yen are connected and jumps to all kinds of conclusions, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死ぬほど美味いラーメン2 (前編)
Ramen to Die For: 2 (Part 1)
Des ramen à tomber raide mort (1re partie)
Shinu Hodo Umai Ramen 2 (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ran, and Sonoko are taken to Sera`s regular ramen spot: the new location of "Ramen Ogura," where a murder previously occurred. Inside they find regulars Shono Yuna, Mizushina Sosuke, and Nakanishi Osamu eating. Conan finds the great quantities of condiments and seasoning they put in the food strange. After they leave, employee Sayo reveals a robbery murder occurred in the neighborhood a few days earlier. The police chased the culprit into the restaurant, and the customers present at the time were Shono, Mizushina, and Nakanishi... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美女とウソと秘密
The Beauty, the Lie, and the Secret
Beauté, mensonges et secrets
Bijou to Uso to Himitsu
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran come across the scene of an accident. A man named Yaginuma fell to his death from the emergency staircase of a parking structure. On top of the stairs was Misaki, who claims to have been attacked by Yaginuma. She claims Yaginuma fell head first when she avoided his attack. One week earlier, Yaginuma broke into Misaki`s home and murdered her husband Takizawa Akira and stole 100 million yen worth of precious jewels from their safe. Kogoro believes Yanagi attacked Misaki to silence her, but after looking at Yaginuma`s body, Conan realizes there`s something wrong with Misaki`s testimony... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 潮入り公園逆転事件
The Tidal Park Comeback Case
La renversante affaire du parc à marrées
Shioiri Kouen Gyyakuten Jiken
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran visit a park with a lake connect to the sea where the scenery changes according to the ebb and flow of the tide. When the tide flows out, Conan spots a body on the flood bridge. The body belongs to Kimishima Ryuji, the second president of a food manufacturing company. Marks on his neck indicate that he was strangled, and Kogoro investigates the case both as a murder and an accident. Park groundskeeper Tanba claims he didn`t see a body when the tide was out in the morning. Chiba prefectural police officer Motoi questions Ryuji`s wife Aoi and his brother Yuta. Both Aoi and Yuta seem to suspect each other... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 少年探偵団の雨宿り
The Detective Boys Get Out of the Rain
Les Detective Boys s`abritent de la pluie
Shounen Tanteidan no Amayadori
episode.summary: In the pouring rain, Conan and the Detective Boys stop by a mansion in the woods to borrow their bathroom. After speaking with the men "Bro" and "Skinny" at the mansion, he realizes they`re not the mansion`s residents, but robbers. While running from the two robbers armed with knives, the Detective Boys rescue Amamiya Maki, the bound resident of the mansion. Conan and his friends flee throughout the mansion with Maki, who doesn`t know where her husband is. Later, as Conan and his friends attempt to escape the mansion, they spot a pool of blood through an open doorway... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゾンビが囲む別荘 (中編)
A Cottage Surrounded by Zombies (Part 2)
La villa encerclée par les zombies (2e partie)
Zombie ga Kakomu Bessou (Chuuhen)
episode.summary: Conan and his friends discover the dead body of producer Harawaki at the filming location of a zombie movie. On his smartphone is a video of Harawaki drinking hydrocyanic acid. Because only the dead Harawaki was able to drive and there is no cell phone service at the cottage, they are unable to call the police. That night, the bedridden Kogoro tells Ran and Kazuha that zombies have surrounded the cottage. The girls don`t believe him, but they are immediately attacked by zombies. Conan and Heiji fight off the zombies, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゾンビが囲む別荘 (前編)
A Cottage Surrounded by Zombies (Part 1)
La villa encerclée par les zombies (1re partie)
Zombie ga Kakomu Bessou (Zenpen)
episode.summary: When Kogoro, Conan, and Ran go to the cottage where a zombie movie was filmed, they encounter Heiji and Kazuha there. A couple ran over a zombie with a broken neck on a road near the cottage, and Heiji has come to confirm the truth behind the story. Later, a movie crew arrives to shoot a trailer for the sequel to the zombie movie. While filming, producer Harawaki goes missing, and the others search for him in the cottage. Conan and Heiji discover the body of the dead Harawaki, and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不思議な少年
The Mysterious Boy
Un étrange garçon
Fushigi na Shounen
episode.summary: When Conan and his friends hear that a UFO has been spotted at on the riverbed near Kometo Bridge, they go to observe the UFO. At the same time, Nagai, manager of Nagai Toys, brings debt collector Oshiro to Beika Bridge. From behind his back, Nagai throws a shining boomerang toy, and Oshiro leans across the bridge when he sees it. In the next moment, Nagai lifts Oshiro legs and drops him over the side. Later, Conan and his friends discover the boomerang toy and body, and Conan realizes the truth behind the UFO sighting... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死ぬほど美味いラーメン2 (後編)
Ramen to Die For: 2 (Part 2)
Des ramen à tomber raide mort (2e partie)
Shinu Hodo Umai Ramen 2 (Kouhen)
episode.summary: A week earlier, after murdering Tonda in the entryway oof her own home, her killer ran into "Ramen Ogura." The police have narrowed the suspects down to three regulars of the shop: Shono, Mizushina, and Nakanishi. After the incident, Yumi ran into her ex-boyfriend Haneda, who says he heard a strange noise every time the culprit took a step. Upon hearing Haneda`s story, Conan realizes something. He and Sera search the water tank of the store`s toilet, solve the mystery behind the reason the culprit was swinging a hose around after committing the crime, determine the reason they`ve continued to visit the shop, and close in on the truth... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二度死んだ男 (前編)
The Man Who Died Twice (Part 1)
L`homme mort deux fois (1re partie)
Nido Shinda Otoko (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Kogoro and Conan witness secretary Shinkai stabbing moneylender Takarada with a chef`s knife. However, Takarada had been strangled to death two hours earlier. Kogoro believes Shinkai stabbed Takarada without realizing he was already dead. Kogoro had been summoned to the apartment by Takarada to discuss a murder threat he received in the mail. Inspector Megure reasons that one of Takarada`s financial victims killed him for revenge, and Shinkai testifies that he stabbed Takarada to prevent said victim from becoming a murderer. Megure also suspects one of his family members may have committed the crime and questions his wife Mika and younger brother Koji, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名探偵に弱点あり
The Great Detective`s Weakness
Le talon d`Achille du détective
Meitantei ni Jakuten Ari
episode.summary: Kogoro chases a robber armed with a gun to the roof of a building. The police eventually arrest the robber, but it soon becomes clear that the robber tossed the gun while fleeing. Kogoro, who already has a fear of heights, enters a state of shock after the fright of being shot at is compounded on top of it. Two days later, Sakaki, the leader of a futures trading group accused of fraud, is shot in the shoulder and leg by a person riding a motorcycle just after being released on bail. The gun used in the incident is none other than the one thrown away by the robber. Feeling responsible for the crime, Kogoro determines the identity of the individual who picked up the gun, but the case isn`t over yet... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゾンビが囲む別荘 (後編)
A Cottage Surrounded by Zombies (Part 3)
La villa encerclée par les zombies (3e partie)
Zombie ga Kakomu Bessou (Kouhen)
episode.summary: After finding the body of Harawaki at the shooting location of a zombie movie, Kyoko is found dead next. On her smart phone is a video in which a zombified Harawaki bites Kyoko on the neck, and Harawaki`s body has disappeared from the other room. Conan and Heiji believe this case and the one from eight years ago may be related. Later, Gunma Police Inspector Yamamura begins his own investigation. With the help of eight year old photos and Kazuha`s comments, Conan and Heiji close in on the truth. Finally, they discover the trick behind the wardrobe and the identity of the killer... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふんわり気球で怪事件
Mystery in a Hot Air Balloon
Un étrange accident de montgolfière
Funwari Kikyuu de Kaijiken
episode.summary: Conan, Ran, and Sonoko arrive at the Suzuki Balloon Festival, a national hot air balloon event. During the race, reigning champion Mizuguchi Shingo`s balloon is struck by Okuda Akihiro`s and begins falling. As the balloon descends, his wife Mizuguchi Arisa falls from the balloon to her death. Because Mizuguchi and Okuda fought before the race, the police suspect Okuda deliberately crashed into Mizuguchi`s balloon. Okuda insists it was an accident, but based on the condition of Okuda`s balloon, they determine it wasn`t an accident but a murder... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲の悪いガールズバンド (後編)
The Unfriendly Girls Band (Part 2)
Un groupe de filles en mauvais termes (2e partie)
Nakanowarui Girls Band (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Girls band member Hagie is murdered at a studio. Her bandmates Someka, Tadako, and Rumi are the suspects. Megure learns hagie often fought with other bands and believes someone outside the band may have committed the murder. After listening to the stories of the three women, Conan checks the video of their band practicing. Conan, Sera, and Amuro close in on the truth after watching the video. Later, they realize why the string-like weapon used to kill the victim hasn`t been found in the studio and determine the identity of the killer and the surprising trick they used... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲の悪いガールズバンド (前編)
The Unfriendly Girls Band (Part 1)
Un groupe de filles en mauvais termes (1re partie)
Nakanowarui Girls Band (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Ran, Sonoko, and Sera head to a practice studio with Conan and Amuro so they can form a high school girl band. There they spot guitarist Someka, bassist and vocalist Tadako, keyboardist Rumi, and drummer Hagie. Later, Hagie is found strangled in the studio where she had been napping. The three band members who went to wake her one by one are suspected of killing her, but when the police can`t find the string used to kill her, the investigation encounters some trouble... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二度死んだ男 (後編)
The Man Who Died Twice (Part 2)
L`homme mort deux fois (2e partie)
Nido Shinda Otoko (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Kogoro and Conan witness Takarada being stabbed, but he was strangled to death two hours earlier. Shinkai had stabbed him without realizing he was dead. His wife Mika has no alibi, and she becomes the prime suspect in the strangling when material evidence is discovered, meaning Koji will inherit Takarada`s fortune. Conan suspects Koji set up Mika and questions him, but it becomes clear that Koji has an alibi. Conan goes over the facts again and gradually closes in on the truth, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドライブデートの別れ道
Turning Point on a Driving Date
Au tournant d`une balade en amoureux
Drive Date no Wakaremichi
episode.summary: Kogoro drives Conand and Kei down a seaside highway. Six months earlier, Remi hanged herself in her apartment. Her neighbor Kei blamed herself for being unable to prevent her suicide. Now Kei has moved and is working at her uncle`s resort inn. Kei is showing Kogoro and Conan around the local area. Remi used fake names to flee from debt collectors. Conan finds it strange that she used her real name to rent an apartment just before she died. He notices a few other strange things about the story as well... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨のバス停[ストップ]
The Rainy Bus Stop
Un arrêt de bus sous la pluie
Ame no Bus Stop
episode.summary: A muffled sound rings down a back alleyway in the rain. When Kogoro and Conan run to the source of the sound, they find Kikuchi unconscious in the driver seat of a car parked near an intersection. In front of his car is the bleeding and dead Tsutsumi. Kikuchi is shocked when comes to and sees Tsutsumi`s body. Kikuchi and Tsutsumi were once coworkers. Kikuchi testifies that a man with an umbrella suddenly jumped into the intersection, and while he quickly slammed on the brakes, he couldn`t stop in time. Later, Tsutsumi`s will is found in his jacket pocket, and Kogoro determines it was not a traffic accident but a suicide... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の贈り物
The Last Gift
Le cadeau d`adieu
Saigo no Okurimono
episode.summary: Officer worker Junko is arrested for a murder that took place in Tonkoro City. Junko confesses she was being blackmailed by the victim Katsui and killed him because she couldn`t take it anymore. However, Kogoro saw Junko in Beika City at the time of the murder. Because Tonkoro City and Beika City are an hour drive apart, Kogoro explains to Inspector Megure that it was impossible for Junko to commit the crime. Her alibi verified, Junko is released... However, a dissatisfied Conan, Kogoro, and Ran question Junko`s coworker Mayumi and her ex-boyfriend Matsubayashi as they close in on the truth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天狗の声が聞こえる
You Can Hear the Tengu`s Voice
Les grognements de tengu
Tengu no Koe ga Kikoeru
episode.summary: While hiking, Kogoro, Conan, and Ran hear the moaning voice of the Tengu. After staying the night at a guest house at the bottom of the mountain, the next morning they decide to visit the Tengu`s Cave, one of the town`s historic sites. Inside the cave Conan discovers a body wearing a tengu mask hanging from the Tengu`s shrine. The body belongs to mayor Mayama. Mayama was being blackmailed by someone over the undocumented contributions he received during the election. Kogoro determines the death is a suicide based on the absence of anyone else in the cave, but Conan feels there`s something off about the body and crime scene... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命暗闇のコナン (前編)
Conan Cornered in the Darkness (Part 1)
Conan, piégé dans le noir, 1re partie
Zettaizetsumei Kurayami no Conan (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan suddenly wakes up in the darkness. While walking with the Detective Boys to go shopping, Conan witnessed a figure breaking open a safe inside a building. Conan was attacked by the culprit and imprisoned inside a rectangular box. Meanwhile, Kogoro is hired to find the thief who stole the will of Karabashi Group chairman Karabashi Gotaro. The suspects have been narrowed down to Kozo the eldest son, Mitsuyo the eldest daughter, and Hideo the second son. Conan manages to get in touch with the Detective Boys using his badge, but he soons finds himself cornered in a desperate situation... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 探偵団はヤブの中 (後編)
The Detectives in a Grove (Part 2)
Les Detective boys dans le brouillard, 2e partie
Tanteidan wa Yabu no Naka (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, Genta, and Ai go to the Beika Department Store with Professor Agasa. During their visit, head chef Hosogoe of the restaurant on the top floor is stabbed by a customer near the stairs. Inspector Megure questions Genta, Ayumi, and Mitsuhiko who all saw the culprit, but their testimonies are all over the place. Together the Detective Boys visit the various floors to determine the why the kids seemed to have seen different culprits. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 探偵団はヤブの中 (前編)
The Detectives in a Grove (Part 1)
Les Detective boys dans le brouillard, 1re partie
Tanteidan wa Yabu no Naka (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, Genta, Ai, and Professor Agasa go to the Beika Department Store together. In the stairwell, they witness Hosokoshi, the head chef at the high-end restaurant on the top floor, being stabbed in the stomach by a disgruntled customer. Conan calls Genta, Mitsuhiko, and Ayumi to let them know the culprit escaped down a different stairway. The potential suspects are part-time worker Kamaya, housewife Mitsuko, and chef Miyanodai. Genta, Mitsuhiko, and Ayumi all saw the culprit, but each of their accounts is totally different from the others. Determining the culprit`s identity will be rather difficult... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千葉のUFO難事件 (後編)
Chiba`s UFO Case (Part 2)
Chiba et l`épineuse affaire d`OVNI, 2e partie
Chiba no UFO Nanjiken (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Nakatsu was suffocated and pressed face-first into concrete. Kuchiki, the man collapsed beside him, denies killing Nakatsu and claims an alien in a UFO killed him instead. Even a nearby security camera captured the shadow of what seems to be a UFO. Conan visits Kuchiki`s house with Detective Chiba and Kogoro to question him. While there, Conan discovers something in the room and realizes the reason behind Kuchiki`s strange actions. Later, Conan confirms the appearance of the UFO with Yona, who claims to have seen one. Having closed in on the truth, Conan gathers everyone to conduct an experiment... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千葉のUFO難事件 (前編)
Chiba`s UFO Case (Part 1)
Chiba et l`épineuse affaire d`OVNI, 1re partie
Chiba no UFO Nanjiken (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Detective Chiba is investigating a strange case that took place three months earlier. Magazine editor Nakatsu was suffocated to death and pressed face-first into a patch of concrete on Haido High School grounds. The prime suspect is UFO fanatic Kuchiki who was lying next to the body in the concrete. Kuchiki denies killing Nakatsu and testifies that an alien flew down in a UFO and murdered Nakatsu while floating mid-air, and a security camera captured a creepy UFO-like shadow... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶体絶命暗闇のコナン (後編)
Conan Cornered in the Darkness (Part 2)
Conan, piégé dans le noir, 2e partie
Zettaizetsumei Kurayami no Conan (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Conan is attacked by a theif attempting to break into a safe and trapped inside a coffin. Kogoro is hired to find the person who stole Karahashi Gotaro`s will and narrows the suspects down to his three children. Conan uses his DB badge to contact Ai and the others and tells them the coffin he`s trapped inside is being transported by a hearse. Mitsuhiko hears about the case Kogoro has been hired to investigate from Ran and deduces that it must be related to the robbery Conan witnessed. Ai and the others realize Conan is inside Gotaro`s coffin, but the hearse is already on its way to the crematorium... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 婚姻届のパスワード (後編)
The Marriage Registration`s Password (Part 2)
Le mot de passe de la déclaration de mariage, 2e partie
Kon`intodoke no Password (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Building manager Hachitsuka hides the envelope containing a marriage registration form Haneda gave to Yumi and locks his computer with an eight digit password. The location of the envelope will be revealed when the code in the room is solved and the eight digit password is entered. Believing the solution may require more than one sheet of paper, Conan and his friends decide to search the room for the other sheet. During their search, Yumi notices the code sheet is a copy and not the original. This clue leads Conan to the solution. Yumi enters the code into the computer, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 婚姻届のパスワード (前編)
The Marriage Registration`s Password (Part 1)
Le mot de passe de la déclaration de mariage, 1re partie
Kon`intodoke no Password (Zenpen)
episode.summary: When Yumi sees a news story about the shogi championship match, she learns for the first time that Haneda is a professional shogi player. Several years earlier, Yumi received an envelope from Haneda and was instructed not to open it until he had acquired "all seven." Haneda has now won all seven major shogi titles. Detective Sato reasons that the envelope`s contents must be a marriage registration, but Yumi threw out the magazine she kept the envelope in that morning. They immediately head to the dump site, but the magazine is gone. Conan and the Detective Boys attempt to help Yumi find the envelope, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サクラ組の思い出 (新一BOY)
Memories from Sakura Class (Shinichi Boy)
Souvenirs du groupe des cerisiers (Le petit Shinichi)
Sakura Gumi no Omoide (Shin`ichi Boy)
episode.summary: 13 years ago, Shinichi and Ran met at kindergarten. Shinichi tells Yusaku and Yukiko about the suspicious behavior of Efune, a teacher who favors Ran. The next day, Efune takes the children to the park far away from the kindergarten. Yusaku goes to check on the children while dressed in disguise and witnesses the driver of a parked van taking photos of the children and smiling. Later, Yusaku learns Efune`s wife is staying at the hospital next to the park and begins to realize Efune`s plot... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サクラ組の思い出 (蘭GIRL)
Memories from Sakura Class (Ran Girl)
Souvenirs du groupe des cerisiers (La petite Ran)
Sakura Gumi no Omoide (Ran Girl)
episode.summary: While Conan walks with Ran, Sonoko, and Sera along a road lined with cherry blossoms, Ran looks at the cherry blossoms and recalls how she met Kudo Shinichi. 13 years ago, Ran was being bullied by some boys in her kindergarten class. She was approached by Shinichi, who had just joined the school. During singing time, Shinichi suspects something is up when he notices teacher Efune staring at Ran the whole time. Later, he`s suspicious when Efune show favoritism to Ran. Efune explains each of his actions, but Shinichi suspects Efun is plotting something... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋の地獄めぐりツアー (大分編)
The Descent into Hell Tour of Love (Oita Chapter)
Tour des enfers en amoureux, 2e partie : Ooita
Koi no Jigoku Meguri Tour (Ooita Hen)
episode.summary: Manami, daughter of the president of Nakashiro Electric, is kidnapped, and the bag containing the 100 million yen in ransom money is carried away by Ogikubo Ryuji using a drone. Detectives Sato and Takagi are also pursuing Ogikubo as the supect in an armed robbery. Ogikubo takes Sato hostage and heads for the Ocean Hell, where he plans to meet up with his accomplice Hiroyuki and split the ransom money. The detectives arrest Ogikubo before he rendezvous with Hiroyuki, but the 100 million yen inside the bag has disappeared. Conan pursues Manami and Hiroyuki in order to solve the case, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋の地獄めぐりツアー (別府編)
The Descent into Hell Tour of Love (Beppu Chapter)
Tour des enfers en amoureux, 1re partie : Beppu
Koi no Jigoku Meguri Tour (Beppu Hen)
episode.summary: Kogoro takes Conan and Ran to the Beppu hot springs in Oita prefecture. Kogoro`s true purpose is not to vacation but to find Nakadai Manami, the missing daughter of nakadai Electric`s president. It`s highly probable that Manami came to Beppu to see her ex-boyfriend Hayami Hiroyuki. Fortunately Kogoro is able to find Manami, and the president Nakadai, secretary Hosogai, and fiance Ehara all come to Beppu, but Manami is kidnapped. Meanwhile, Detective Sato and the police are pursuing an armed robber in Oita... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 米花町二転三転ミステリー (後編)
The Shifting Mystery of Beika City (Part 2)
Mystères et rebondissements à Beika (2e partie)
Beika Chou Nitensanten Mystery (Kouhen)
episode.summary: The body of murdered neighborhood nuisance Amagi is discovered, and neighborhood association president Bando also appears to have been poisoned pesticides. The police believe Bando chose to kill himself after murdering Amagi, but... A piece of evidence discovered at Bando`s home leads to college professor Chino becoming the prime suspect. However, Conan realizes something off about the case and reasons that the real killer framed Chino. Conan suspects Fukuda and Hiro, but while investigating them discovers an important clue at the cafe and realizes what really happened and the identity of the real killer... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 米花町二転三転ミステリー (前編)
The Shifting Mystery of Beika City (Part 1)
Mystères et rebondissements à Beika (1re partie)
Beika Chou Nitensanten Mystery (Zenpen)
episode.summary: The body of neighborhood nuisance Amagi is found in the park of a high class neighborhood. He was murdered around 9 PM the previous night. The body was stabbed numerous times by an awl-like weapon. Next to the body is the bloodstained medical examination card of neighborhood association president Bando. The police head to Bando`s home to question him... but Bando has been poisoned with a combination of liquor and pesticides, and near the body is a bloodstained awl. Detectives Takagi and Chiba believe that after stabbing Amagi, Bando chose to end his own life, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: セレブ夫婦の秘密
The Socialite Couple`s Secret
Le secret d`un couple notoire
Celeb Fuufu no Himitsu
episode.summary: Kogoro and Conan search a fourth floor apartment when they`re asked for help by the trio standing in front of the room: Saki`s friend Maiko, building manager Yoshie, and deliveryman Matsuda. Inside they find the bodies of residents Maehara and his wife Saki. Day trader Maehara had recently made a lot of money, and the valuables are missing from the apartment. Inspector Megure deduces from the apartment`s condition and the testimony of the trio that Saki pretended to be a robber and murdered Maehara, but made a mistake while disguising herself as a victim and suffocated herself. However, Conan notices something strange about the crime scene... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 消えた黒帯の謎
Mystery of the Missing Black Belt
Le mystère de la ceinture noire disparue
Kieta Kuroobi no Nazo
episode.summary: Conan and Sonoko arrive at a dojo in Osaka where Kyogoku is training. Takami, the master of the dojo, once provided Kyogoku with a great deal of help with his karate training. While Conan and Sonoko watch the children practice, Kajiyoshi shows up to get Takami`s signature on their agreement. Operating the dojo has become difficult to the point that Takami has taken out a loan, and he is considering selling the dojo. Later, an important black belt is stolen from the dojo`s display case. When Kyogoku is suspected of stealing the belt, he challenges Takami to a fight. If he wins, the dojo will remain open, and if Takami wins, he`ll return the belt... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 17年前と同じ現場 (後編)
Just Like a 17 Year Old Crime Scene (Part 2)
Scènes de crime analogues à 17 ans d’intervalle (2e partie)
17 Nen Mae to Onaji Genba (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Real estate company president Hiyama is murdered while holding a pair of scissors. The crime scene is very similar to that of an unsolved case from 17 years ago. Conan and Okiya beleive former candy shop owner Senba who discovered the body is the culprit, but are unable to determine how he brought the weapon inside the annex where the crime took place. Later, Conan and Okiya question the bodyguards standing at the entrance and identify the trick the culprit used to bring the weapon inside. They even find the weapon, and they begin solving the whole case... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 17年前と同じ現場 (前編)
Just Like a 17 Year Old Crime Scene (Part 1)
Scènes de crime analogues à 17 ans d’intervalle (1re partie)
17 Nen Mae to Onaji Genba (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Real estate company president Hiyama is murdered while holding a pair of scissors invented by Agasa, so Conan and Okiya accompany Agasa to the crime scene. The man who discovered the body is former candy shop owner Senba. Agasa suspects Senba is the murderer, but it was impossible for Senba to have entered the house with a weapon. The current case closely resembles a 17 year old case in several ways, such as the murder victim holding scissors and the sink left running at the crime scene. Conan and Okiya watch as Senba recreates the steps he took when he discovered the body and notice several contradictions... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 防犯システムの落とし穴
The Security System`s Pitfall
Piégé par un moyen de défense
Bouhan System no Otoshiana
episode.summary: Kogoro is hired by Junko to catch a thief. While working the case, the body of Junko`s neighbor Kitagami is discovered in the parking lot behind her apartment building. Kogoro reasons Kitagami got drunk and accidentally fell from his room, number 704. Inspector Megure and the police investigate the room, and Conan finds it strange that Kitagami left his front door unlocked when his apartment was fully equippped with anti-theft devices. Conan questions Sawada, the resident of 604 and room directly below Kitagami`s, and believes his death wasn`t an accident. Later, an unexpected person is revealed to be the thief, and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暗闇の山岳ルート
The Dark Mountain Route
Un obscur itinéraire alpin
Kurayami no Sangaku Route
episode.summary: While hiking, Conan and his friends meet campers Eiko, Ashizuka, Hayashida, and Takemi at a mountain cottage. The four of them have gathered to commemorate the death of their friend Motoki who accidentally fell to their death three years ago. Takemi, who camped by herself in a tent at the bottom of a cliff, is found murdered the next morning. The time of death is estimated between 3 AM to 5 AM, making it impossible for Eiko or Ashizuka to have killed her. Suspicion falls on weather station employee Hayashida who went to a nearby mountain to collect data in the middle of the night, but something about the case bothers Conan... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏切りのステージ (前編)
The Traitor`s Stage (Part 1)
Scène de trahison (1re partie)
Uragiri no Stage (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ran, Sonoko, and Okiya are invited to watch musician Hado`s rehearsal, but once they arrive, they are told by his manager Enjo that they cannot go inside. The group is shocked to learn from record company president Fuse that this will be Hado`s last concert. An argument erupts when reporter Kajiya suggests the name of Hado`s new song is also the name of his new girlfriend. Later, the fire department arrives to inspect the concert hall, where they find Hado hanging from the neck above the stage... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 口の悪い九官鳥
The Foul-Mouthed Myna Bird
Le médisant mainate
Kuchi no Warui Kyuukanchou
episode.summary: Kokubo Mamoru visits his aunt Kokubo Naoko`s home and discovers she has been murdered. While Mamoru is there, his aunt`s famously foul-mouthed myna bird Nine escapes. Naoko lives with her maid Megumi. Megumi was not at home because she was out shopping. It is revealed that Naoko, a collector of rare old books, had purchased a forgery from used book seller Sayama. Inspector Megure believes Mamoru, Megumi, or Sayama is the culprit, but all three of them have alibis. Nine says something that brings Conan closer to the truth behind the case... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霊魂探偵殺害事件 (後編)
The Spirit Detective`s Murder (Part 2)
L’affaire du médium détective assassiné (2e partie)
Reikon Tantei Satsugai Jiken (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Toto TV`s Kokuri visit hotel room 402 where spirit detective Hotta Gaito is staying where they witness the fleeing suspect and discover Hotta`s murdered body. Conan examines the room while recalling the events leading up to and immediately after they opened the door. Conan and Sera have already identified the killer. Later, Conan realizes the trick the killer used based on Kogoro`s actions. Conan puts Kogoro to sleep using a tranquilizer and is about to solve the case when he realizes his bow tie-shaped voice changer is missing... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霊魂探偵殺害事件 (前編)
The Spirit Detective`s Murder (Part 1)
L’affaire du médium détective assassiné (1re partie)
Reikon Tantei Satsugai Jiken (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Kogoro agrees to conduct an interview with spirit detective Hotta and heads to a hotel with Conan for a meeting. After meeting up with Toto TV`s Kokuri, they go to Hotta`s room, but there`s no answer. As they`re standing outside the room, Kokuri notices an email he received from Hotta saying, "They`re going to kill me. Help." Around 9 AM, Kogoro and the others have a bellhop unlock the door and enter the room. Kogoro spots someone fleeing from the balcony. In the bed is Hotta`s body, stabbed numerous times in the chest... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 断崖に消えたコナン (後編)
Conan Disappears over a Cliff (Part 2)
La disparition de Conan au bord d`une falaise, 2e partie
Dangai ni Kieta Conan (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Robber Mizorogi is out to kill hacker Isehara for betraying him. Conan and Isehara flee together, but they fall off a cliff. Megure and the police search the ocean, but they`re unable to find anything after three hours. Three and a half hours earlier, while falling down the cliff, Conan ejected a soccer ball from his belt. Using the ball, Conan and Isehara rolled into the cave directly below the cliff. With Isehara`s help, Conan attempts to stop Mizorogi`s next robbery, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 断崖に消えたコナン (前編)
Conan Disappears over a Cliff (Part 1)
La disparition de Conan au bord d`une falaise, 1re partie
Dangai ni Kieta Conan (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan, Haibara, Ayumi, Genta, and Mitsuhiko go to a villa owned by Professor Agasa`s acquaintance where they discover injured hacker Isehara. Isehara was formerly an accomplice of Mizorogi, a robber known as Zorro, but now Mizorogi is trying to kill him after his betrayal. Conan rescues Isehara and flees from Mizorogi and his henchmen, but they are cornered on a cliff. Conan tries to stop Isehara from falling when his foot slips while evading an arrow show from Mizorogi`s crossbow, but the two of them fall over the edge together... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 汽笛の聞こえる古書店
The Whistling Bookstore
Librairie ancienne et sifflet de train
Kiteki no Kikoeru Koshoten
episode.summary: Conan and his friends happen upon owner of Tamaki`s Used Bookstore, Tamaki Yujiro, and his son Ichiro having an argument. The store has become run down, and Ichiro wants his father to close it down. Later, Conan and his friends go to the park next to the bookstore, which has a genuine steam engine on display. When the steam engine`s wheels start moving at 15:00, Conan and his friends take a commemorative photo with Ichiro, who happened to be passing by. Later, they notice the shelves in the bookstore have fallen like dominos, crushing Yujiro beneath them... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏切りのステージ (後編)
The Traitor`s Stage (Part 2)
Scène de trahison (2e partie)
Uragiri no Stage (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Musician Hado is found hanging by the neck above the stage of a concert hall. Inspector Megure believes one of Enjo, Fuse, or Kajiya committed the murder. While looking at Hado`s license and the evidence lined up at Ran`s feet, he comes to a realization. Later, Conan sees Kajiya`s footage of Hado`s face as he entered the concert hall and notices something. After confirming which objects disappeared from the crime scene, he and Amuro and Okiya search the stage and determine the truth behind the case and the trick the killer used to lift the victim`s body... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コナンと平次の鵺伝説 (解決編)
Conan and Heiji`s Nue Legend (Resolution Arc)
Conan, Heiji et la légende du Nue (3e partie : La résolution)
Conan to Heiji no Nue Densetsu (Kaiketsu Hen)
episode.summary: Conan and his friends have come to Yadori Village in Shizuoka to help unearth Tokugawa`s buried treasure. At night, Yasukatsu and Michiki are killed with marks left on their bodies as though they were attacked by the legendary monster Nue. Conan and Heiji arrive at the truth of the situation and decide to recreate the trick used by the culprit. At four in the morning, Heiji announces he`s discovered the true identity of the Nue and gathers everyone in front of the hotel. Later, the signpost begins burning, and the monster appears with an eerie cry. Conan and Heiji appear before the others and explain the identity of the monster and the murderer... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コナンと平次の鵺伝説 (爪跡編)
Conan and Heiji`s Nue Legend (Scratch Arc)
Conan, Heiji et la légende du Nue (2e partie : Les griffures)
Conan to Heiji no Nue Densetsu (Tsumeato Hen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ran, Heiji, and Kazuha have come to Yadori Village in Shizuoka to help excavate the buried treasure of Tokugawa. At night, Yasukatsu is murdered. On his back are scratches that look as though he was attacked by a wild beast, and Hajime panicks over the possibility of it being a Nue. The members of the group agree to wait in their rooms until the police arrive while Conan, Heiji, and Densuke keep an eye on them from the forest. Later, an eerie cry rings throughout the area again, and the field Conan and his friends are standing in begins catching fire all over the place. Then a scream is heard coming from the hotel... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コナンと平次の鵺伝説 (鳴声編)
Conan and Heiji`s Nue Legend (Roar Chapter)
Conan, Heiji et la légende du Nue (1re partie : Le cri)
Conan to Heiji no Nue Densetsu (Nakigoe Hen)
episode.summary: Conan and Ran are invited by Heiji and Kazuha to Yadori Village in Shizuoka. Densuke, the village mayor, also invited archaeologist Michiki, historian Yasukatsu, author Fumie, and documentary writer Hajime to help unearth Tokugawa`s buried treasure. Long ago, a member of the excavation team died in a cave-in. Before he died, he wrote the word "nue" on a piece of paper. The Nue is a monster from fairy tales, and the village has Nue legends of its own. That night, the group stays in a run-down hotel in the village, and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノブナガ四五〇[よんごうまる]事件
The Nobunaga 450 Case
L`affaire Nobunaga 450
Nobunaga Yongoumaru Jiken
episode.summary: This year is the 450th anniversary of Oda Nobunaga taking Gifu castle. Conan, Ayumi, Genta, Mitsuhiko, Haibara, and Professor Agasa have come to Gifu City to enjoy the events celebrating the anniversary. At night, Conan and his friends go to watch the five-man origami fighting squad, the Nobuna Gaizers. Mitsuhiko loves local heroes. After returning to their hotel, Mitsuhiko leaves to get the autographs of the Nobuna Gaizers but goes missing. Meanwhile, the history museum is robbed. The security cameras captured the Nobuna Gaizers stealing objects from the exhibits... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 試着室の死角 (前編)
The Blind Spot in the Changing Room (Part 1)
L`angle mort de la cabine (1re partie)
Shichakushitsu no Shikaku (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan, Ran, Sonoko, and Sera go swimsuit shopping at a department store. Conan leaves the store and passes by women`s clothing store "Shimusa" where he witnesses employee Nanbu, customer Nitsuka, and customer Sashihara and her employee Yamaki arguing. The high-handed Sasihara verbally abuses the other three. Later, when Conan and his friends go to check out the situation at Shimusa, they hear a scream. Sashihara has been strangled to death in the changing room with a dying message left in her left and right hands... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 交差する運命の二人
A Pair of Crossing Fates
Destins croisés
Kousa Suru Unmei no Futari
episode.summary: Torimaru robs a house in Beika before running away. While fleeing, he pushes aside Genta on a mountain path. Later, he turns a corner and crashes into Gonno, causing the two of them to fall off a cliff. Genta and his friends look for the man who pushed him. Torimaru changes into the unconscious Gonno`s clothes and dresses Gonno in his own in order to frame him. Suffering from amnesia after hitting his head, Gonno encounters a partol officer near the station. Based on his clothes, the officer believes Gonno is the wanted robber... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 機械じかけの目撃者
The Mechanical Witness
Le témoin mécanique
Kikai Jikake no Mokugekisha
episode.summary: Kogoro brings Conan and Ran to Kusumi Machinery, a robot factory. Kogoro has been hired by President Kusumi to determine which of his employees Tanizaki, Horiuchi, and Isshiki have been leaking parts to Myojo Technics. Kogoro believes Tanizaki, who met with Makita of Myojo Technics, is responsible. That night, Kogoro, Conan, and Ran hide in the factory to catch the thief in the act, but Tanizaki`s body is found in the storeroom where a gas leak occurred. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不思議な予知仏像
The Mysterious Prophetic Buddha
L`étrange statue bouddhique prophétique
Fushigi na Yochi Butsuzou
episode.summary: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran go to Hoto Temple to solve the mystery of a strange Buddha. The eleven-faced Kannon sometimes turns to face the side or turns its back on its own, and something bad always happens when it does. The Buddha is facing backwards on this day as well, and head priest Fukuhara`s wife and daugher worry that something bad will happen again. Later, Conan and his friends witness the priest and his son arguing. That night, as predicted by the Buddha, the priest is murdered in the temple... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さざ波の魔法使い (後編)
The Magician of the Waves (Part 2)
Le magicien des vagues (2e partie)
Sazanami no Mahou Tsukai (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Ten years ago, immediately after a young Kudo Shinichi meets Akai Shuichi`s family on the beach, a car falls off a cliff. It becomes clear the car belonged to two thieves who robbed a watchmaker. The driver died immediately, but their accomplice fled from the sinking car and blended in with the crowd on the beach. With the help of Shinichi and his friends, Shuichi narrows down the suspects to Fukumizu Shigekatsu, Kitamori Yasue, and Oami Raiya. The police detective decides to question the three of them, and Shuichi determines which of them is the robber based on their testimony... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さざ波の魔法使い (前編)
The Magician of the Waves (Part 1)
Le magicien des vagues (1re partie)
Sazanami no Mahou Tsukai (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Ten years ago, a young Kudo Shinichi meets Akai Shuichi, his brother Haneda Shukichi, his sister Sera Masumi, and his mother Mary at the beach. At the beach, a car falls off a cliff and into the ocean. Shuichi attempts to rescue the man in the sinking car, but he died instantly. While underwater, he notices a bag full of brand-name watches with price tags attached in the back seat of the car. Shuichi believes the car is involved in some kind of criminal case and searches for the passenger who has blended in with the crowd... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 探偵団と幽霊館
The Detective Boys and the Haunted House
Les Detective Boys et le manoir hanté
Tanteidan to Yuurei Yakata
episode.summary: Conan, Genta, Mitsuhiko, and Ayumi get caught in the rain and seek shelter in a mansion. At the mansion they meet servants Saburo and his wife Hana, as well as lodger Hideto. Chieko, wife of master of the house Otaguro, used a wheelchair but died in an accident two months earlier after falling from a cliff. Otaguro claims Chieko`s ghost has been visiting him since two weeks ago, and Conan and his friends witness a yellowish light and a wheelchair moving on its own. At Mitsuhiko`s insistence, Conan and the Detective Boys try to solve the mystery of the ghost, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 試着室の死角 (後編)
The Blind Spot in the Changing Room (Part 2)
L`angle mort de la cabine (2e partie)
Shichakushitsu no Shikaku (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Cosmetics company president Sashihara is strangled to death in the women`s clothing store of the department store Conan and friends have come to. Sashihara leaves a dying message using her left and right hands. Inspector Megure decides to question store employee Nanbu, customer Nitsuka, and Sashihara`s employee Yamaki. Later, the forensics team discovers scissors, tape, and a straw in the trash can near the crime scene. Conan and Sera have determined the killer`s identity, and a conversation with Sonoko and Ran gives them the hint they need to know how the killer entered the victim`s changing room without her causing a fuss... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絵本から飛び出す爆弾魔 (後編)
The Pop-up Book Bomber (Part 2)
Le poseur de bombes sorti d`un livre (2e partie)
Ehon kara Tobidasu Bakudanma (Kouhen)
episode.summary: A pop-up book and pink smartphone are delivered to the Mori Detective Agency. In the pop-up book are warnings of a series of explosions. The riddle for the location of the third bomb is "the middle of 7." Conan and his friends think of things expressed in sevens and what the middle of those things might be. In a week, it`s Thursday. In a rainbow, it`s green. In a musical scale, it`s fa. Overwhelmed by the number of possibilities, Kogoro holds his head in his hands. At the police station, they begin searching for places, companies, and schools corresponding to Thursday, Green, and fa, but Conan reasons that Hirukawa`s target lies elsewhere... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絵本から飛び出す爆弾魔 (前編)
The Pop-up Book Bomber (Part 1)
Le poseur de bombes sorti d`un livre (1re partie)
Ehon kara Tobidasu Bakudanma (Zenpen)
episode.summary: A pop-up book and pink smartphone arrive at the Mori Detective Agency. The book turns out to be a warning of the serial bombings that have been occurring. The culprit is Hirukawa Takuji, half-brother of Imai Kenichi, the now deceased author of the book, and a man with a previous bomb manufacturing conviction. Due to his hatred of detectives, Hirukawa chose the famous Kogoro to become involved in the case. The locations of the bombs are riddles, and Conan works with Kogoro, Megure, and publisher Tomonaga Hiroyuki to find them, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎解きは喫茶ポアロで (後編)
Solving Mysteries at the Poirot Cafe (Part 2)
Résolution d`énigme au café Poirot (2e partie)
Nazotoki wa Kissa Poirot de (Kouhen)
episode.summary: In the darkness while a breaker at Cafe Poirot is blown, someone stabs Anzai in the back with a knife. Megure suspects one of Yui, Ozumi, Nagatsuka, or Wada did it. Conan and Heiji discover the trick the culprit used to prevent the victim`s blood from getting on himself, but the only person who could`ve used the trick couldn`t have committed the crime. Conan tries to uncover the truth behind Yui and Anzai`s relationship. Later, Wada suddenly recites a poem from One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets, which provides the hint Conan and his friends need to determine the culprit and the trick he used that enabled him to carry out his crime... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎解きは喫茶ポアロで (前編)
Solving Mysteries at the Poirot Cafe (Part 1)
Résolution d`énigme au café Poirot (1re partie)
Nazotoki wa Kissa Poirot de (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Heiji and Kazuha come from Osaka to see holiday lights with Conan and Ran. While Ran and Kazuha are making dinner, Conan and Heiji kill time at Cafe Poirot. Beika University students Ozumi, Yui, Anzai, and Nagatsuka sit at the table next to them to celebrate Yui`s birthday. Later, a breaker is tripped and the cafe is plunged into darkness. When cafe employee Azusa resets the breaker and the lights come back on, Conan and the other patrons are speechless. On the floor is Anzai, who has been stabbed in the back with a knife... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪盗キッドの絡繰[からくり]箱 (後編)
Kaito Kid and the Trick Box (Part 2)
Kid l`Insaisissable et la boîte mécanique (2e partie)
Kaitou Kid no Karakuribako (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Jirokichi holds an exhibition for a trick box containing Luna Memoria, the world`s largest moonstone, on display in order to lure Kaito Kid. Kimika asked Jirokichi to open the trick box left to her by her husband. Conan senses Kid`s presence nearby and is on his guard. The group sets to finding the written instructions for opening the box in the ten thousand books donated by Kimika. Later, Kimika recounts a memory of her husband in hopes that it will help them find the book. Conan realizes where the book is and the true contents of the box, but Kid makes his move... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪盗キッドの絡繰[からくり]箱 (前編)
Kaito Kid and the Trick Box (Part 1)
Kid l`Insaisissable et la boîte mécanique (1re partie)
Kaitou Kid no Karakuribako (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Kimika asks Jirokichi to help her open a trick box created by a mid-19th Century tinkerer. Inside the box is Luna Memoria, the world`s largest moonstone left to her by her late husband. The instructions to open the box are written on a piece of paper stuck between the pages of one of ten thousand books given to Jirokichi. In order to lure Kaito Kid, Jirokichi puts the trick box containing Luna Memory on display. Conan and friends try to figure out how to open the box, while Kid lurks nearby in disguise... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幕末維新ミステリーツアー (萩編)
The Meiji Restoration Mystery Tour (Hagi Arc)
Le mystérieux tour Bakumatsu-Ishin (2e partie : Hagi)
Bakumatsu Ishin Mystery Tour (Hagi Hen)
episode.summary: One year ago, robber Kurataya Komakichi shot Japanese-style cafe owner Takarada in the arm and stole millions of yen worth of Keicho gold coins. Kogoro is hired by news site reporter Asuka to investigate the case. Asuka is kidnapped, and Kogoro and Conan split up to look for her. Kogoro believes the suspicious Inspector Takajo is Komakichi. Conan finds Asuka in the foundry with her hands and feet tied on the conveyer belt, slowly heading towards the furnace... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幕末維新ミステリーツアー (山口編)
The Meiji Restoration Mystery Tour (Yamaguchi Arc)
Le mystérieux tour Bakumatsu-Ishin (1re partie : Yamaguchi)
Bakumatsu Ishin Mystery Tour (Yamaguchi Hen)
episode.summary: Kogoro receives a letter from a mysterious person named Kurataya Komakichi claiming he wants to give him his family treasure, so he heads to Yamaguchi prefecture with Conan and Ran, but he`s mistaken for a robber`s accomplice and is arrested. Komakichi is the name of a robber who shot owner of Japanese-style cafe Takarada in the arm and stole millions of yen worth of Keicho gold coins. Kogoro is released after news site reporter Asuka clears up the misunderstanding. Kogoro, Conan, and Ran visit Hagi in their investigation into the case, but someone is trying to kill them... Source: Crunchyroll

episode.title: 新任教師の骸骨事件 (後編)
The New Teacher`s Skeleton Case (Part 2)
La nouvelle maîtresse et le squelette (2e partie)
Shinnin Kyoushi no Gaikotsu Jiken (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Conan, the Detective Boys, and their assistant homeroom teacher Wakasa discover a ten year old skeleton in the basement of the old school storage shed. They begin attempting to crack the code written on the headband the skeleton was holding in its hand. The class schedule Ayumi found in the storage shed is the key to the code, which is related to a ten year old case in which four thieves stole 200 million yen worth of gold ingots from a wealthy man`s home. The skeleton belonged to the boss of the thieves. Conan cracks the code and comes up with a plan to catch the other three thieves who are coming for their shares... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新任教師の骸骨事件 (前編)
The New Teacher`s Skeleton Case (Part 1)
La nouvelle maîtresse et le squelette (1re partie)
Shinnin Kyoushi no Gaikotsu Jiken (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Conan and his friends, along with assistant homeroom teacher Wakasa, discover a skeleton in the old storage shed at the school. The victim died approximately ten years earlier. Ten years ago, a group of four thieves broke into the home of a wealthy man and fled with 200 million yen worth of gold ingots. That same night, a group of suspicious figures were seen entering Teitan Elementary School. Conan and his friends attempt to crack the code written on the headband found in the skeleton`s hand. Conan realizes the class schedule Ayumi found in the storage shed is the key to cracking the code... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白い手の女 (前編)
The Woman with White Hands (Part 1)
La femme à la main blanche (1re partie)
Shiroi Te no Onna (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Early in the morning, professional golfer Banno Tengo tells his girlfriend Kurumi he wants to break up, so Kurumi demands 100 million yen in damages. The two of them decide to discuss things that night. That night, while at Wakasa-sensei`s apartment, Conan and friends hear loud music coming from the apartment next door. They go to Banno`s room to complain, where they discover him and Kurumi on the floor. Banno is only unconscious, but Kurumi is dead. Banno claims he was attacked by a woman with white hands. Conan and his friends saw the same woman, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: となりの江戸前推理ショー (後編)
The Tokyo-Style Detective Show Next Door (Part 2)
Numéro de déduction au restaurant d`à côté (2e partie)
Tonari no Edomae Suiri Show (Kouhen)
episode.summary: The thief who stole Hijirisawa`s pouch containing a million yen dark horse payout ticket on the train is narrowed down to sushi restaurant customers Harashima, Munechika, and Ashino. Hijirisawa had injured her finger, and when her pouch was stolen, she grabbed the thief`s sleeve and got blood on them, but no bloodstains were found on the sleeves of the three customers. Conan believes the thief had a reason for coming to the sushi restaurant and realizes the trick they used to remove the bloodstain based on something Hijirikawa says. Mystery-loving chef Wakita claims to have identified the thief and begins explaining his reasoning, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: となりの江戸前推理ショー (前編)
The Tokyo-Style Detective Show Next Door (Part 1)
